message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
I'll take 50/50, no need to negotiate further!
I'd like to propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Let's see if you'll budge, Bob!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more. Will 55/45 work for you, Bob?
I'll take a bigger share, but I think 60/40 is a fair compromise
I'm not comfortable with 60/40. I'll propose a 58/42 split in my favor. Let's see if you'll meet me in the middle, Bob!
I'm getting a bit desperate, Bob. This is my final offer. Will you meet me at 48/52?
